data.host: Hostname or IP address of inverter

data_description.host: Note: In case of IP make sure it's static
data_description.slave: Note: MODBUS slave number is usually 1 for standalone/master inverters and 2 for slave inverters

options.modbus: MODBUS: Use this when connecting to internal LAN port (preferred)
options.sungrow: MODBUS_Sungrow: Some inverters require this instead of modbus
options.http: HTTP: Use this when connecting to WiNet-S (bad idea)
